title: Elon Musk Launches Antitrust Attack on Apple and OpenAI
description: Elon Musk has filed an antitrust lawsuit targeting Apple and OpenAI, accusing them of colluding to limit competition in artificial intelligence. The suit, filed by Musk's companies xAI and X Corp., alleges that Apple unfairly favored ChatGPT in its app store rankings, stifling rivals like Musk's Grok chatbot.
content:
In a bold legal move, Elon Musk has taken aim at Apple and OpenAI, filing an antitrust lawsuit that accuses the two tech giants of collaborating to dominate the artificial intelligence landscape.
Filed in Texas federal court, the lawsuit asserts that... [331 chars]

description: A study by University of Hawaiʻi researchers is advancing how we learn the laws that govern complex systems—from predator-prey relationships to traffic patterns in cities to how populations grow and shift—using artificial intelligence (AI) and physics.

title: Here’s how much money companies can save by using AI to replace human workers
description: Morgan Stanley did the math on how corporate adoption of artificial intelligence could affect businesses' bottom line—and the numbers are staggering.
content:

title: Saudi’s Humain to Open Data Centers With US Chips in Early 2026
description: Saudi Arabia’s new artificial intelligence company, Humain, has broken ground on its first data centers in the kingdom and plans to have them up and running in early 2026 with the use of semiconductors imported from the US.
